FILE: cm541553v11.0.txt
DYAD: MOZAMBIQUE - MALAWI
RIVALRY: RIV1154
DISPUTE(S): MID2589 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180731
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20181005

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2589

TERRMID: MID2589 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2589 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2589 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2589 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2589 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2589 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2589 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2589 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2589 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2589 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID2589 from Gibler 2018, Malawi supported rebels in Mozambique who were fighting against the government. In 1986, the presidents of Zambia and Mozambique confronted the president of Malawi over its support for the rebels. The president of Mozambique also threatened to blockade Malawi if its support continued. Coded civil war MID because this is connected to Malawi's support of militarized rebels in Mozambique, within this dyad. 

CIVWARLINK: MID2589 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2589 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2589 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2589 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2589 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2589 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:
Mozambique accused Malawi of supporting *Resistencia Nacional Mocambicana* (RNM) rebels in July 1986, and President Samora Machel of Mozambique threatened to deployed missiles on the border with Malawi on September 11, 1986. President Hastings Kamuzu Banda of Malawi responded by expelling RNM rebels from the country in October 1986. Malawi and Mozambique signed an accord on mutual cooperation on December 18, 1986.

SOURCES-CM: 
Brecher and Wilkenfeld, 1997, 479-480.

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
